line: now they’re a little more than i normally spend on boots or rent
i’m gonna miss being able to afford food
i’m sorry they just they just look so good
and the saleswoman was looking at me like oh these are way too expensive for you
yeah well too bad we’re gonna have to return them
i mean i i know they cost a lot but i’m going to wear them all the time
i mean have you ever had something so beautiful everyone wanted it
nice try i’m keeping the boots
and and i’m gonna play with you all the time
how can you let him talk to your crotch like that
okay cause when when he said i can’t wait to hear your first words i thought there’s a trick
well i gotta go you guys
umm can you do me a favor
i was talkin’ to my sister and she knows you work at ralph lauren
i am not sending anymore ralph lauren clothes to prison
no no no no no no not her not her
my youngest sister dina she’s really interested in fashion and she wants to talk to someone successful y’know to give her some advice
i guess i can talk to one of my supervisors
oh no no no no she wants to talk to you
okay so will you meet with her
have her come by the office
you’re gonna love her so much
and oh she’s the smartest of all the tribbiani children
doesn’t ben go to the smithfield day school
sting has a son that goes there too
yeah i know he’s in ben’s class
you knew this and you never said anything
with all the stupid dinosaur stuff you tell us
sting’s son seven years old and there’s a picture
the kidnappers guide to manhattan private schools
it’s an article about the best schools in the city
so how well do you know sting
uh i actually haven’t even met him
uh huh yeah that’s too bad
i really want to go to his concert friday night but it’s totally sold out
why don’t you meet him and get tickets
if you get two i’ll take you
well actually i’m picking ben up tomorrow maybe he’ll be there
you might actually get to meet sting tomorrow
i’m getting a lot of use out of them already
see you can wear them with dresses with skirts with pants
you can wear them with shorts on a street corner and earn the money to pay for them
the guy who made these hates feet and wants to see them die
well well you can give them to me
i haven’t felt my feet in years
i spent so much money on them and i told chandler that i’d wear them all the time i just can’t give them away
well then get your money back and return them
the soles’ are already a little scuffed up and the insides are filled with my blood
hey i uh just picked up ben from school
i don’t think you did a very thorough job
i dropped him off at carol’s
anyway it turns out that i’m not going to be able to get those tickets though
well it turns out that ben and sting’s son do not get along
apparently sting’s son made fun of the fact that ben’s moms are lesbinims
but ross if they don’t get along then you should smooth things over
phoebe you can’t force kids to be friends
give them some blocks put them in a playpen
look i’m sorry pheebs i can’t do it
look phoebe i’m sorry it’s just
ross can give me the tickets
thanks so much for meetin’ with me
joey’s told me so much about you
this is so exciting for her
well i’ll let you two fash ists get down to business
all right dina well let’s talk about the different areas of fashion that you could get involved in
let’s see there’s design but you may need a whole other degree for that
uh there’s there’s sales which is great because you get to travel
i i don’t care about fashion
and i know you are too so you gotta help me
oh nothing i’m just just was yawning
oh don’t forget my office holiday party is tonight
honey we don’t really have to go to this thing tonight do we
now sweetie i know you don’t like my office parties but you can wear your new boots
every cloud has a supple leather lining
i i don’t i don’t think that i’m gonna wear the boots tonight
well y’know i’m just i’m just worried that bosses will see them and think they pay you too much money
or your assistant will see them and and want a raise
do you think i work at some kind of boot pricing company
anyway i picked up this outfit that i want to wear and the and the boots don’t really go with it
you said that you paid all that money because those boots go with skirts dresses and pants
if you want me to wear the boots i’ll wear the boots
in fact i’ll go into my room right now and y’know try the outfit on
i i can’t go in there
honey it’s going to be okay
he’s been incredibly supportive of me and if he gets a little upset that’s what the meatball sub is for
honey why don’t you sit down
dina has something that she wants to tell you
joe mom and dad are fine
joey there’s something that you should know
well obviously this is a mistake
because you have to have s x to get pregnant
joe i tried to wait until i was 25 like you did
bobby corso but he’s a real nice guy
all right i’ll be back in a little while
i can’t look at you right now
aunt phoebe what are you doing here
well i heard you’re having a problem with one of the boys in your class
and so i thought i would just come down here and sit you both down have a little talk and make it all okay
now umm the boy’s name is sting’s son
now ben sometimes people may seem like jerks on the outside but they have famous fathers
my friend doug is waiting for me over there
can can i help you with something
yes you can i’m looking for jack’s parents
are you with one of the students
are you one of ben’s mothers
i am one of ben’s mothers
it was it was difficult coming out to my parents
i’ve only met your partner carol
okay so that would make me susan
are you looking for jack’s parents to discuss the problems he’s having with ben
because i really do think the parents should sit down and have a conversation
we should sit down and talk just me my lover carol and the stings
umm how how will i get in touch with them
oh their number is on the contact sheet
umm could could i get a copy of that
‘cause carol threw it out she lost ours
she’s such a scatterbrain but man what a hot piece of ass
i didn’t know there would be dancing
i don’t see any uh cabs
what honey it’s like fifteen blocks to the subway
do you think that we can get to the subway right there if we climb down through the manhole cover
these boots were a huge mistake
all right i never should have bought them
this is what it feels like to be right
how are we gonna get home
wait just give me a second i need to just get my boots off first
ah ooh oohh ohh oh god ohh oh ohh ohhhh
honey i know you’re in pain right now but i’m a little turned on
do you ever worry that you’ll be walking and your baby will just like slip out
just what needs to be done
dearly beloved we are gathered here to join this man and this woman
don’t interrupt me when i’m talkin’ to god
do you dina take this man
you don’t get a say in this
i heard i do we’re halfway there
listen as beautiful and moving as this ceremony is it’s not legal
they they don’t have a marriage license they don’t have any witnesses and the groom only has on one shoe
yeah he took the other one off and hit me with it
well what am i supposed to do
you’re supposed to realize that they are adults
and that they can make their own decisions
they were stupid enough to get knocked up
yeah we kinda didn’t use any
sting’s pen that he gave to phoebe
why else would i be here
i gather jack and ben haven’t been getting along lately
i’m told there are two sides to this story but all i’ve heard is that ben’s a bit of a poo poo head
won’t won’t jack’s father be joining us
oh i’m sorry jack’s father is not available
for say friday night perhaps at 8 o’clock
oh no i know that wouldn’t work
that does put us in quite a pickle
because you see i’m very busy before and after the concert and he’s obviously busy during
so i guess you and i should talk about jack and ben right now
unless umm okay i i would be willing to go to the concert umm all the while thinking about the children of course
i’m not giving concert tickets to someone who’d use their son like this
look i’ve just pressed a button triggering a silent alarm
any minute now the police will be here
can you get a little closer so i can see the price
i can see it from right here
i think i can walk the rest of the way now
just just give me my boots
well i don’t have them either
well why don’t you check in one of my saddlebags while i chew on a bale of hay
god well we gotta go back and get them
honey are you seriously ever gonna wear the boots again
okay i’m never gonna wear them again
i just didn’t get a chance to say goodbye
you can say goodbye to the tan ones
joey just because they’re not getting married doesn’t mean this is going to be a disaster
now what’s the future look like for dina and bobby
well i really have high hopes for my band
i get when you told people at first that you wanted to be an actor they laughed at you
now come on bobby why don’t you tell us a little bit about your band
well it’s just me and my pal rooster the band’s name is numb nuts
dina if you’re having a baby you should be married
even if it is to bobby
i knew you wouldn’t be supportive
you’re gonna have the baby and and raise it by yourself without a husband
you can’t be a single mother alone
you’re not some dumb kid who doesn’t know what she’s doing
one pregnant woman at a time please
i just want you to be okay
so forcing her to marry bobby is gonna make that happen
well so so uh what kind of music does numb nuts oh forget it
joey i am scared to death about this
but i really think i can do it i’m just gonna need some help
and bobby’s gonna be here the whole time
and to answer your earlier question we’re straight up gangster rap
look rachel’s told me how much easier you’ve made all this on her
why can’t you do that for me
i mean you’re my favorite guy in the whole world
i’m not even scared to tell mom and dad
i was scared of telling you
well i’d be scared of them but all right
joey i can’t stand the thought of having this baby with you mad at me
i want him to have his uncle
is my baby gonna have his uncle joey
of course he’s gonna have his uncle joey
i mean even if we’re not married this baby is gonna be so loved
okay bobby why don’t we just come over here and let them have a little moment
you’re gonna love me so much
well let’s just say rosss caaaaan
okay now would you say that that’s more than 50 yards away from sting his wife or a member of his family
then that’s not breaking the law
